title: Geographic Origin
description: The geographic location from which objects associated with the ObjectGroup were collected.

properties.name: continent
properties.description: The name of the continent in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: country
properties.description: The name of the country or major administrative unit in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: countryCode
properties.description: The standard code for the country in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: county
properties.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (county, shire, department, etc.) in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: ecoRegion
properties.description: High level biogeographic region of the location.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: island
properties.description: The name of the island on or near which the Location occurs.

properties.name: islandGroup
properties.description: The name of the island group in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: locality
properties.description: The specific description of the place. Less specific geographic information can be provided in other geographic terms (higherGeography, continent, country, stateProvince, county, municipality, waterBody, island, islandGroup). This term may contain information modified from the original to correct perceived errors or standardize the description.

properties.name: municipality
properties.description: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than county (city, municipality, etc.) in which the Location occurs. Do not use this term for a nearby named place that does not contain the actual location.

properties.name: region
properties.description: The name of a spatial region or named place of any size within an individual or multiple administrative areas.

properties.name: salinityType
properties.description: A set of terms to indicate the water environment of aquatic collections.

properties.name: stateProvince
properties.description: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country (state, province, canton, department, region, etc.) in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: waterBody
properties.description: The name of the water body in which the Location occurs.

properties.name: waterBodyType
properties.description: A term that indicates the aquatic order of a waterbody.
